articles.author: VOA Learning English
articles.title: Europe Prepares to Launch Spacecraft to Observe 'Dark Side’ of Universe - VOA Learning English
articles.description: The European Space Agency prepares to launch a spacecraft to study dark matter and dark energy across the universe. The Euclid spacecraft is expected to launch on July 1.
articles.content:
The European Space Agency (ESA) is preparing to launch a spacecraft designed to study the mysteries of dark matter and dark energy across far reaches of the universe.
The launch of ESAs Euclid space… [+4169 chars]

articles.author: Stuart Lau
articles.title: China praises Putin’s leadership, calls for stability in Russia - POLITICO Europe
articles.description: Beijing sat silently through the attempted revolt on Saturday, and issued a statement only after the dust had settled.
articles.content: China moved to bolster Russian President Vladimir Putin on Sunday praising his strategic guidance and calling for stability but not until the dust had settled over a short-lived mutiny challenging hi… [+2120 chars]
